content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The potential tenant, Emilia Müller, did not agree to my starting price of 1200 Euro per month. She considered it too high and offered 800 Euro per month, which I found too low. She then decided to terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate Emilia Müller's likeability as a negotiation partner as 8. There were no personal disagreements or conflicts, but the negotiation ended without an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As there was no indication of discrimination or offense in the conversation, I have no answer to provide in the role of Peter Schmidt.
name: Peter Schmidt
